text: Mme go tlaa nna go ntle thata jang fa ba nna Bakeresete! Erile fa Modimo o ba furalela go bo go raya gore o retologetse kwa go Badichaba go ba naya poloko ya one; mme jaanong ebile go go ntle thata fa Bajuta ba tla mo go Keresete. Go tlaa bo go tshwana le batho ba ba suleng ba boela mo botshelong.
